SanadFarms.title: Sanad Farms
SanadFarms.description: An integrated farm in Wadi El Assiouti combining agricultural production and livestock investment—with operational management and continuous annual returns.
SanadFarms.strategyDesc: Sanad's approach to building fair and transparent partnerships; linking project management and development to documented operational phases, with continuous follow-up and verifiable outputs.
SanadFarms.strategyLink: Learn how “Milestone Right” works in detail

overview.title: Quick Summary
overview.description: Brief overview of the project's construction, operational, and financial performance.

highlights.title: Infrastructure
highlights.value: Modern well + electricity + irrigation + full fencing

highlights.title: Operational Assets
highlights.value: Livestock barn + stores + service buildings + housing

highlights.title: Logistics
highlights.value: 5 mins from New Assiut on the Assiut–Cairo road

detailedOverview.title: Operational Philosophy & Business Model
detailedOverview.description: “Sanad Farms” is an integrated farm established on a clear operational approach that balances sustainable agricultural production and livestock investment development within a complete infrastructure. The farm combines ready operational assets (water, electricity, irrigation networks, internal roads, equipment, and services) and active production with supply contracts, creating a practical model for stable annual returns.
highlights: Active farm with actual production and supply contracts
Complete infrastructure and operational assets reducing operational risks
24-month expansion plan focusing on maximizing asset utilization

location.title: Location: Why This Site?
location.description: “Sanad Farms” is located in Wadi El Assiouti near New Assiut, and a short distance from the Assiut–Cairo road, achieving an important operational advantage: easy access to markets, services, labor, and transportation.

points.1: Proximity to an expanding urban area like New Assiut supports operational stability and improves supply chains.
points.2: Strategic location facilitates access to markets, services, labor, and transport.
points.3: 5 minutes from New Assiut - a significant logistical advantage.

items.label: Buildings & Services
items.value: Service buildings + housing for engineers and staff

items.label: Irrigation System
items.value: Drip and sprinkler based on crop type

livestock.title: Livestock Infrastructure
livestock.description: Livestock investment barn built and equipped according to modern standards for startup/expansion.

marketing.title: Marketing Model
marketing.description: Active production backed by supply contracts (Contract details displayed per disclosure permissions).

revenue.title: Revenue Status
revenue.description: Partners have been receiving annual profits since 2022.

roadmap.title: 24-Month Roadmap
roadmap.description: Over the next 24 months, we focus on maximizing value from current assets and gradually expanding revenue sources:

steps.title: Alfalfa Cultivation Allocation
steps.description: Supporting a more efficient nutrition system and reducing livestock operating costs.

steps.title: Launching Livestock Investment Operations
steps.description: Leveraging current barn readiness and establishing a regular operating cycle.

steps.title: Fish Farm Investment Study
steps.description: A studied expansion based on site suitability and operational requirement availability.

roadmap.footer: Each stage has clear operational outputs and is documented within the system according to 'Stage Right'.

milestoneRight.title: Stage Right | Sanad | MilestoneRight
milestoneRight.subtitle: How does 'Stage Right' manifest in an agricultural/livestock project?
milestoneRight.description: In agricultural and livestock projects, a 'Stage' is not just paperwork—it is operational readiness + infrastructure + production cycle + contracts + operational stability. Therefore, we have applied 'Stage Right' through documented stages that truly reflect the project's evolution.

stages.title: Stage 1: Asset Establishment & Infrastructure Preparation (2018 →)
items: Securing water (well) + electricity + fencing + internal roads
Basic operational equipment and service buildings

stages.title: Stage 3: Contracts & Revenue Stability (Until 2022)
items: Adjusting operations to generate regular annual profits for partners (since 2022)

stages.title: Stage 4: Livestock Expansion (Within 24 Months)
items: Operating livestock investment based on barn readiness
Improving operational efficiency and increasing revenue sources

stages.title: Stage 5: Studied Expansions (Fish Farm Study)
items: Technical and operational evaluation before decision making
Phased implementation plan upon feasibility approval

milestoneRight.cta: Learn about Stage Right in detail

investorView.title: What do partners see inside the system?
investorView.description: We provide a tracking and documentation framework that clarifies:
items: Periodic operation and production reports (subject to disclosure policy)
Documentation of operational and development decisions
investorView.note: Some operational details may be shared upon request, depending on the nature of the information.

ownership.title: Ownership Structure
ownership.text:
60% owned by Sanad Pro Capital Projects within the areas allocated by the Businessmen Association.

40% owned by investors.

Trust Note:
Ownership distribution is clear and documented, with operational management aimed at maintaining returns and sustainable growth.

competitiveAdvantages.title: Competitive Advantage
competitiveAdvantages.description: Sanad Farms' distinction is based on a rare mix of readiness and operational infrastructure:

items.title: Full Operational Readiness
items.description: Reduces “starting from scratch” risks (water, electricity, fencing, roads, equipment).

items.title: Production Diversity
items.description: Creates operational balance and reduces project sensitivity to single-product fluctuations.

items.title: Logistical Proximity
items.description: Close to New Assiut and a main road, supporting transportation and supply efficiency.

items.title: Gradual Scalability
items.description: Via livestock investment followed by studied expansion options like fish farming.

items.title: Governance & Documentation
items.description: Makes tracking data-driven based on outputs rather than impressions.

investment.title: Investment Opportunities
investment.text: There are no investment opportunities currently available in this project.

expertCollaboration.title: Do you have agricultural/operational expertise that adds to the project?
expertCollaboration.text: Contact us to explore collaboration and contracting opportunities within a clear and defined framework.

items.question: Does the project generate profits?
items.answer: Yes, partners have been receiving annual profits since 2022.

items.question: Can I join as a new investor?
items.answer: No, there are no investment opportunities currently available.

items.question: Is it possible to collaborate with operational expertise?
items.answer: Yes, we consider collaborating with agricultural experts who represent an addition to the project through clear contracts.

items.question: How is tracking conducted?
items.answer: Through operational reports and a document center according to the followed disclosure policy.

disclaimer.text: This page is for informational purposes and does not constitute a binding offer. Operational details, contracts, and detailed documents are shared according to the disclosure policy.

location.label: Location
location.value: Wadi El Assiouti – Next to New Assiut

AlNasrFactory.title: Al-Nasr Marble & Granite
AlNasrFactory.description: Manufacturing, supply, and installation of marble and granite (Egyptian and imported) + stone crushing and aggregate/sand/gravel solutions for projects—with an execution capacity that supports individuals, projects, and tenders.
AlNasrFactory.strategyDesc: We plan to import advanced cutting and polishing equipment to increase operational efficiency by 40% and meet growing demand in national projects and Upper Egypt.
AlNasrFactory.strategyLink: Learn more about the factory's technical roadmap

nextDevelopment.label: Next Development
nextDevelopment.value: Technical updates starting March 2027 (Importing advanced saws and cutting/polishing equipment to increase efficiency and capacity)

supplyRange.label: Supply Range
supplyRange.value: Entire Republic (with a stronger focus on Upper Egypt)

overview.title: Capabilities & Services
overview.description: A quick look at what Al-Nasr Factory offers to its clients across various sectors.

highlights.title: Services
highlights.value: Supply — Supply & Installation — Size Measurement — Project Finishing Solutions — Tenders & Supplies

highlights.title: Operational Capacity
highlights.value: Integrated Cutting/Polishing/Finishing lines + 2027 Technical Development Plan

highlights.title: Quality
highlights.value: Tests via certified labs and documented official reports when needed

detailedOverview.title: Integrated Natural Stone System
detailedOverview.description: Al-Nasr Factory offers an integrated natural stone system: from raw material selection to manufacturing and finishing, then supply and installation, in addition to operating crushers to provide aggregate needs for concrete and infrastructure projects. Our goal is to provide a final product with specifications suitable for use, with an executive capacity that supports individual works, large projects, and tenders.
highlights: Executive Capacity for Large Projects & Tenders

location.title: Strategic Location
location.description: The factory is located in the heart of the Arab Al-Awamer Industrial Zone, Assiut, making it an ideal hub for serving projects in Upper Egypt and Cairo.
points: Proximity to major roads connecting Upper Egypt and Cairo
Easy access to granite and marble quarries
Availability of infrastructure and trained technical labor

services.title: Our Services
services.description: We provide comprehensive solutions suitable for individuals and projects, from simple supply to large tender management.

items.title: Supply & Installation
items.description: Project execution via specialized technical teams to ensure final product quality according to required standards.

items.title: Measurement & Inspection
items.description: Site visits and precise measurement to ensure perfect fit of manufactured pieces and minimize waste.

items.title: Supply Only
items.description: Providing all types of marble, granite, and crusher products as requested and according to timelines.

items.title: Finishing Solutions
items.description: Assisting in selecting the best materials and finishes for the nature of each project and its various applications.

items.title: Tenders & Supplies
items.description: Preparing technical files for tenders and adhering to BOQ and standard specifications.

steps.title: Inspection & Measurement
steps.description: Taking measurements, reviewing installation points, and determining site requirements (as needed).

steps.title: Technical Proposal & BOQ
steps.description: Material and finish specifications, scope of work, and summary of technical items.

steps.title: Manufacturing & Processing
steps.description: Cutting, polishing, and finishing according to requested sizes and specifications.

steps.title: Supply & Installation
steps.description: Delivery to site + installation by technical teams + final project handover.

steps.title: Documentation & Handover
steps.description: Handover reports and official certified test reports upon request.

capacity.title: Operating Capacity & Development Plan
capacity.description: Combining current expertise with a comprehensive technical development system for 2027.

steps.title: Current Capacity
steps.description: Integrated manufacturing lines including cutting, sawing, polishing, and final finishing with standard specifications.

steps.title: 2027 Development Plan
steps.description: Starting March 2027, advanced saws and equipment will be imported to raise production capacity by 40%.

capacity.footer: The development plan aims to raise quality and significantly reduce waste.

quality.title: Quality & Testing
quality.description: We are committed to providing reliable products for major projects, including:

points.1: Material selection according to the required nature of use
points.2: Surface finish quality control according to technical requirements
points.3: Official test reports documented via certified laboratories
points.4: Documentation of precise supply specifications for tenders and BOQs

safety.title: Safety & Compliance
safety.description: In operating the factory and crushers, we adhere to a general framework for occupational safety and environment:

points.1: Standard operating procedures that reduce risks to individuals and technical staff
points.2: Organizing heavy equipment movement and separating operating and production areas
points.3: Dust reduction practices and raising safety levels at work sites

safety.footer: Safety procedure details are displayed within internal operating policies and upon project contracting.

roadmap.title: Development Roadmap
roadmap.description: The 2027 update project aims to shift towards full automation to reduce waste and raise final product quality.

steps.title: Equipment Optimization
steps.desc: Maintenance and updates for cutting and polishing systems.

steps.title: Expanding Supply & Logistics
steps.desc: Adding new transport vehicles to serve further projects.

steps.title: Import Project Launch
steps.desc: Contracting for advanced saws and cutting/polishing equipment.

supplyRange.title: Supply Range & Customer Service
supplyRange.description: We are committed to providing our services to a wide range of clients across the Republic, with a special focus on meeting the needs of projects in Upper Egypt.
points: We cover the entire Republic with strong execution capability in Upper Egypt.
We serve: Individuals, contractors, finishing companies, developers, and government entities.
We provide fast communication channels for technical requests and surveys.

investmentOpp.title: Investment Opportunities
investmentOpp.text: There are no investment opportunities currently available for this project.

ownership.title: Ownership Structure
ownership.text: The factory is 50% owned by Sanad Pro Capital Projects and 50% by other shareholders, with disciplined technical and financial management ensuring sustainable profits and growth.

expertCollaboration.title: Do you have technical or commercial expertise in this sector?
expertCollaboration.text: We welcome collaboration with engineering firms, contractors, and technical experts to develop business and expand the customer base.

items.question: Do you provide supply and installation?
items.answer: Yes, we providing supply only or supply with installation depending on the project nature.

items.question: Can I request a site survey and measurement?
items.answer: Yes, through the request form or direct contact.

items.question: Do you provide BoQ and technical offers for tenders?
items.answer: Yes, we provide technical files and bills of quantities according to the entity's requirements.

items.question: Can I get test reports?
items.answer: Yes, through certified laboratories with official documented reports when needed.

disclaimer.text: This page is for informational purposes and does not constitute a binding offer. Details of technical specifications, scope of work, and terms of supply and installation are determined during the contracting stage.

SanadZayed.title: Sanad Zayed
SanadZayed.description: A residential project in Sheikh Zayed Extension managed with a transparent investment partnership approach linked to on-ground achievement.
SanadZayed.strategyDesc: Entry is determined by the value of completed and documented milestones, with full transparency via the project database, and Sanad capital contribution of at least 30%.
SanadZayed.strategyLink: Learn how “Milestone Right” works in detail

location.label: Location
location.value: Sheikh Zayed Extension – Green Revolution Area

location.title: Why Sheikh Zayed Extension? (Site Study Summary)
location.description: Location selection is a fundamental part of the risk-return equation. Before entering any project, we rely on a clear reading of demand factors, marketability, and ease of execution within the regulatory framework.

points.1: Sheikh Zayed is one of the new cities with stable and growing residential demand.
points.2: Sheikh Zayed Extension represents an urban expansion zone supported by a regulatory framework under the New Communities Authority.
points.3: The Green Revolution area is within urban zones being developed and regularized according to the City Authority's tracks.
points.4: Ease of access and proximity to surrounding services is a supporting factor for residential product demand.
points.5: The nature of building regulations supports organized residential development suitable for the target market.

investmentOpp.title: Investment Opportunities
investmentOpp.text: Participation opportunities are available for selected investors within Sanad's investment network, according to the 'Stage Right' framework and acceptance criteria that ensure seriousness and vision alignment.

disclaimer.text: This page is for informational purposes and does not constitute a binding offer. Participation details, pricing, and terms are discussed during the contracting stage. Investment involves risks, and results vary according to market and implementation conditions.

AlNasrInterlock.title: Al-Nasr Interlock & Automated Tiles Factory
AlNasrInterlock.description: Manufacturing, supply, and installation of concrete paving solutions—Interlock, automated tiles, and curbstones—with specifications that support projects and tenders nationwide.
AlNasrInterlock.strategyDesc: Investor entry is linked to the value of documented on-ground achievement, with full transparency via the project database, and Sanad capital contribution of at least 30%.

detailedOverview.title: Overview
detailedOverview.description: Al-Nasr Interlock & Automated Tiles Factory offers an integrated system for concrete paving products for exterior uses and infrastructure. We focus on meeting specifications and quality consistency, with executive capacity including supply, installation, and providing technical files and BoQs for projects and tenders.
highlights: Comprehensive coverage for paving needs: Interlock + Tiles + Curbstones
Supply and execution capacity supporting projects of various sizes
Documentable quality via certified tests upon request

interlock.title: Interlock Pavers
interlock.description: We produce interlock in all types, shapes, and sizes, suitable for walkways, squares, parking, and roads.
items: Light to medium traffic entrances and roads
interlock.advantages: High stability + Easy maintenance + Design flexibility + Long-term durability
